titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd in the cathedral church of St. Peter in York, on the 6th of February 1685/6 being the day on which His Majesty began his happy reign / by William Stainforth.
titleStmt.author: Stainforth, William, d. 1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jo. White, for Francis Hildyard,

notesStmt.note: "Imprimatur R. Altham, Rmo. P. Dno. Johan. Archiep. Ebor. à sacris domesticis."
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
